reviews.text: Friendly staff, clean pleasant decor and nice atmosphere and views..... let me correct that very very good pub inn. Exceptional friendly staff and good management  who are always mire than happy to accommodate your needs. Lovely to be there.
Truly delighted local pub. Great food, great beer, lovely ambiance and atmosphere.
Excellent. Great food, good service, kids happy and a nice and friendly atmosphere.

Good menu selections for New Year's Day, and relatively quiet at lunchtime.
Thanks for opening.
Very pleasant pub - good beers and and really excellent food. Parking could be tricky although we were lucky and found a space in the small parking area at the front.  Dog-friendly.
